original_text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?
korean_text: 이튿날 이스라엘 사람끼리 싸울 때에 모세가 와서 화해시키려 하여 이르되 너희는 형제인데 어찌 서로 해치느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다음 날 그는 그들에게 자신을 나타냈습니다

sentences.original_text: and would have set them at one again
why do ye wrong one to another?
